invoke a hook

this function also takes care of loading all modules.

string$hookhook to invoke
array$argsarguments-array (can include references)

string$last_modulelast module to call (optional)

array$argsarguments-array
Returns:

load_modules ( $  search = '',
$  optional = false 
)

load modules

use this function instead of including module_* files directly.

Parameters:
string$searchmodule to load (by default all modules are loaded)
bool$optionalwhether to log any error to locate the module
Returns:
bool true if successful, false if not

register_hook ( $  hook,
$  info = '' 
)

register a hook

this function is for information purposes only. you can also use a hook without registering it here. this is not recommended though.

Parameters:
string$hookhook name
string$infosome words on the hook's purpose

run a service

Returns:
